mapper.select: select id, username, name, gender, address, age, is_active, email, phone_number from users where username = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, name, gender, address, age, is_active, email, phone_number) VALUES (#{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{age}, #{isActive}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{userName}, password = #{password} WHERE id = #{userId}
UPDATE users SET is_active = #{isActive} WHERE id = #{userId}
